title: Aural set, Easy Winners - rhythmic feature

content.prompt: Which of the following is a rhythmic feature of the excerpt?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in performed music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
